dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: coverMethod
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table links the cover scale recognized by the plot data collectors to a cover scale specified in the coverIndex table. This table, together with the coverIndex table, defines a coverclass method.

attribute.attNotes: Primary key for the coverMethod table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique coverclass methodology.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the citation table.
attribute.attDefinition: Foreign Key into the citation table, linking the defining reference to a cover method.
Name of the coverclass method (e.g., Braun-Blanquet, Barkman, Domin, Daubenmire, Carolina Vegetation Survey, etc.).
